name: Ablative Plating
description: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

name: Advanced SLAM
description: After you perform a {slam} action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

name: Afterburners
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {boost} action, even while stressed.

name: Electronic Baffle
description: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to remove 1 red token.

name: Engine Upgrade
description: Adds: {boost}

name: Hull Upgrade
description: Adds: {hull}

name: Munitions Failsafe
description: While you perform a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 {charge} you spent as a cost for the attack.

name: Shield Upgrade
description: Adds: {shield}

name: Static Discharge Vanes
description: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 {hit} damage.

name: Stealth Device
description: While you defend, if your {charge} is active, roll 1 additional defense die. After you suffer damage, lose 1 {charge}.

name: Tactical Scrambler
description: While you obstruct an enemy ship's attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

name: Impervium Plating
description: Before you would be dealt a faceup Ship damage card, you may spend 1 {charge} to discard it instead.

name: Synchronized Console
description: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the Synchronized Console upgrade at range 1-3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Spare Parts Canisters
description: Action: Spend 1 {charge} to recover 1 charge on one of your equipped {astromech} upgrades. Action: Spend 1 {charge} to drop 1 spare parts, then break all locks assigned to you.

name: Delayed Fuses
description: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1 fuse marker on that device.

name: Angled Deflectors
description:
Adds: {reinforce}
Removes: {shield}

name: Targeting Computer
description: Adds: {lock}

name: Independent Calculations
description: Replace your Networked Calculations ship ability with the following: Independent Calculations: While you perform a white {calculate} action, you may treat it as red to gain 1 additional calculate token. Other ships cannot spend your calculate tokens using the Networked Calculations ship ability.

name: Overdrive Thruster
description: While you perform a red {boost}, {barrel}, or {slam} action, you must use a template of 1 speed higher, if able.

name: Precision Ion Engines
description: Before you execute a speed 1-3 Koiogran Turn ({k}) maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to execute that maneuver as a Segnor's Loop ({sl} or {sr}) maneuver instead.

name: Mandalorian Optics
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to acquire a lock on an object in your {af}. While you perform a primary attack, if you have a lock on the defender, ignore obstacles beyond range 0 obstructing the attack.

name: Beskar Reinforced Plating
description: While you defend, if the attacker is in your {af}, before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 {charge} to be dealt that card facedown instead, or spend 2 {charge} to discard it instead.

name: Burnout Thrusters
description:
Adds: {slam}
After you perform a {slam} action, lose 1 {charge}. Then you may gain 1 deplete token to remove 1 disarm token. If your {charge} is inactive, you cannot perform the {slam} action.
